00026 namespace LatticeSemi_PCIe

00029 
00045 class DLLIMPORT RegisterAccess
00046 {
00047 public:
00048 
00049     RegisterAccess(void *drvrID) {pDrvrID = drvrID;}
00050     virtual ~RegisterAccess() {/* Nothing to do */ ;}
00051 
00052 
00053     /*=====================================================*/
00054     /*         REGISTER ACCESS METHODS                     */
00055     /*=====================================================*/
00056     virtual uint8_t read8(uint32_t addr) = 0;
00057     virtual void write8(uint32_t addr, uint8_t val) = 0;
00058     virtual uint16_t read16(uint32_t addr) = 0;
00059     virtual void write16(uint32_t addr, uint16_t val) = 0;
00060     virtual uint32_t read32(uint32_t addr) = 0;
00061     virtual void write32(uint32_t addr, uint32_t val) = 0;
00062 
00063     /* Block Access Methods */
00064     virtual bool read8(uint32_t addr, uint8_t *val, size_t len, bool incAddr=true) = 0;
00065     virtual bool write8(uint32_t addr, uint8_t *val, size_t len, bool incAddr=true) = 0;
00066     virtual bool read16(uint32_t addr, uint16_t *val, size_t len, bool incAddr=true) = 0;
00067     virtual bool write16(uint32_t addr, uint16_t *val, size_t len, bool incAddr=true) = 0;
00068     virtual bool read32(uint32_t addr, uint32_t *val, size_t len, bool incAddr=true) = 0;
00069     virtual bool write32(uint32_t addr, uint32_t *val, size_t len, bool incAddr=true) = 0;
00070 
00071 
00072 private:
00073     void *pDrvrID;
00074 
00075 
00076 };
00077 
00078 } //END_NAMESPACE
